question: 伊達
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>attain</kanji> <kanji>Italy</kanji>-ness, you are becoming like the Italians. In this case, that's pure <vocabulary>elegance</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>dandyism</vocabulary>. Also <vocabulary>sophistication</vocabulary>. Mamamia!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for both kanji are ones you haven't seen before. But, just think about how when you go on a <reading>date</reading> (<ja>だて</ja>) you probably want to have as much <vocabulary>elegance</vocabulary> as possible. Makes the date go better.
